sources.title: Iceberg MERGE Operations and ACID Guarantees
sources.synthesis: Iceberg MERGE enables upserts with full ACID guarantees via snapshot isolation. Copy-on-write ensures data consistency during concurrent operations.

sources.title: IBM watsonx.ai Python SDK Documentation
sources.synthesis: Python SDK for watsonx.ai provides LLM inference with granular parameter control including temperature, top-p, and token limits.

sources.title: Prompt Engineering for Confidence Calibration in LLMs
sources.synthesis: Explicit confidence calculation instructions in prompts improve calibration. Evidence-based scoring reduces default middle-value bias.
